description: This table contains cord blood disposition, selected in Stork's Delivery Summary activity, populated in the delivery record. This information is also copied to the OB_EPT_BH_CRDBLOOD table in the baby's Patient (EPT) record.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEL_CORD_BLOOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the cord blood disposition. This information is stored in the Delivery Record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
